titleStmt.title: English military discipline, or, The way and method of exercising horse & foot according to the practice of this present time with a treatise of all sorts of arms and engines of war, of fire-works, ensigns, and other military instruments, both ancient and modern, enriched with many figures.
titleStmt.author: Harford, Robert, fl. 1677-1681.
